programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: Check out all the epic Monster Jam racing and freestyle action from Nissan Stadium on June 18, 2016.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: The Georgia Dome is rocking with 60,000 fans ready for Monster Jam racing excitement!

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: Raymond James Stadium - Tampa, FL - Freestyle
programme.desc: The ground shakes as Monster Jam heads outdoors for freestyle! Tampa's Raymond James Stadium is on fire for the monster trucks this week.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: Stadium Championship Series East continues its tear through the sunshine state as Tyler Menninga attempts to drive Grave Digger to back-to-back event championships. Meanwhile, Tristan England is undefeated on the Ray-J racetrack and looks to pilot JCB Digatron to a perfect racing record as Monster Jam continues in Tampa.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: Stadium Championship Series East rolls into upstate New York as Tyler Menninga attempts to clinch his second straight series title, while JCB Digatron’s Tristan England and Megalodon’s Todd LeDuc attempt to block Grave Digger from the series win.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: Stadium Championship Series East ends its Florida run on a mud filled track in Jacksonville. Tyler Menninga looks to mudslide the momentum from a perfect event in Orlando while Blake Granger rides his International Series success back home in the states as he pilots Max-D.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: Stadium Championship Series East slip-slides its way into Gillette Stadium as Bryce Kenny looks to launch Great Clips Mohawk Warrior to back-to-back freestyle wins, as Grave Digger’s Tyler Menninga hopes his competitors don’t rain on his parade to a sixth series title.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: The fun continues in Miami, FL as your favorite Monster Jam trucks and drivers show off their motor skills at loanDepot Park.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: Catch up with Monster Jam's awesome racing and freestyle action from the Georgia Dome in March of 2017!

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: Monster Jam keeps on rockin' in this country town with freestyle.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: Monster Jam Stadium Championship Series East drives into the Rodeo Capital. Grave Digger’s Tyler Menninga holds the series points lead and looks for his third consecutive event win as Tom Meents returns to the stadium where he debuted Maximum Destruction 20 years ago.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: Monster Jam's 2022 season continues with round 19 of the Stadium Championship Series, at Lumen Field, in Seattle, Wa.

programme.desc: Monster Jam’s 2022 season continues with round 7 of the Stadium Championship Series, at NRG Stadium in Houston, TX.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: Don't miss the racing and freestyle action from Qualcomm Stadium, on January 23, 2010.

programme.title: Arena in 30
programme.desc: Grave Digger’s Krysten Anderson looks to stay in the hunt for the series title as Arena Championship Series West heads to Lincoln, Nebraska. Earth Shaker’s Tristan England and El Toro Loco’s Elvis Lainez attempt to keep the black and green wrecking machine from winning the event championship when Monster Jam roars into Pinnacle Bank Arena.

programme.title: Best of Monster Jam
programme.desc: Check out this epic compilation of Grave Digger's best moments - featuring drivers Tyler Menninga, Krysten Anderson, and more over the years!

programme.sub-title: Broadmoor World Arena - Colorado Springs, CO
programme.desc: The Arena Championship Series West title is on the line as Earth Shaker’s Tristan England looks to clinch the series and earn an automatic bid to Monster Jam World Finals XXII when the action heats up from Broadmoor World Arena in Colorado Springs.

programme.desc: Buckle in for racing and freestyle fun from Paul Brown Stadium, on July 10, 2010.

programme.title: Arena in 30
programme.desc: Arena Championship Series Central takes over the historic Greensboro Coliseum as Dragon’s Coty Saucier brings his series points lead to North Carolina. Reigning World Finals Racing Champion, Brandon Vinson tries to lead Grave Digger to the Overall Event Championship while Tony Ochs looks to take a bite out of the competition in the brand-new ThunderROARus.
